channel.title: CVE Feed for theeventscalendar -- The Events Calendar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for theeventscalendar -- The Events Calendar

item.title: CVE-2023-6557|2024-08-02T08:35:14.035Z -- theeventscalendar -- the%20events%20calendar
item.description: The The Events Calendar plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 6.2.8.2 via the route function hooked into wp_ajax_nopriv_tribe_dropdown. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract potentially sensitive data including post titles and IDs of pending, private and draft posts.
